description:
Junpei Kousaka is a second-year high school student who despises cats and has an allergy to them. It just so happens that his high school crush is Kaede Mizuno, a girl who adores cats. One day, while walking home from school, Junpei kicks an empty can and unfortunately beans the local neko-jizou-sama (guardian deity of cats). He finds he can now understand what cats are saying, including his family's own ill-tempered cat, Nyamusas. However, if he does not grant 100 wishes from cats, he will turn into a cat himself.

(Source: Anime News Network)

tags.name: Animals
tags.description: Prominently features animal characters in a leading role.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Nekomimi
tags.description: Humanoid characters with cat-like features such as cat ears and a tail.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Gyaru
tags.description: Prominently features a female character who has a distinct American-emulated fashion style, such as tanned skin, bleached hair, and excessive makeup. Also known as gal.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Twins
tags.description: Prominently features two or more siblings that were born at one birth.

tags.name: Curses
tags.description: Features a character, object or area that has been cursed, usually by a malevolent supernatural force.

Hamaji Yakumo - √after and another
Hamaji Yakumo - H2O ~Footprints in the Sand~
Haruhi Kimisaka - Happiness
Kinoshita Rumi - Pia Carrot e Youkoso!! G.O. Summer Fair
Satou Hina - Pia Carrot e Youkoso!! G.P. Gakuen Princess Portable

Chaos; Head - F.E.S (Kishimoto Ayase)!~
Known to be a fast and efficient worker. Often directing multiple works at a time.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/93473950)

Worked as an assistant to [Shirou Oono](https://anilist.co/staff/132305/) in the late '90s.

[Website](http://5pb.jp/records/sp/asami/index.html) | [Blog](http://blog.livedoor.jp/ubiquitous777/) | [Twitter](http://twitter.com/asamingosu)

Debuted as a voice actress in 1999 and as singer in 2009 by releasing her first single "Day by Day / Shining Blue Rain" under the 5pb. Records label. Currently working with Eri Kitamura in the music unit ARTERY VEIN.

**Non-Anime Roles:**

- Drake - Azur Lane (VG)
- Levia - Trillion: God of Destruction (VG)
- Noire / Black Heart - Hyperdimension Neptunia
- Otohana Sumire - Blue Archive

title.native: 道産子ギャルはなまらめんこい
変態王子と笑わない猫。
ときめきメモリアル Only Love
俺の脳内選択肢が、学園ラブコメを全力で邪魔している
異能バトルは日常系のなかで
同居人はひざ、時々、頭のうえ。
沖縄で好きになった子が方言すぎてツラすぎる
